short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increases webpage accessibility by allowing the user to customize their browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to customize their browsing experience by changing the font of the text on a webpage, disabling autoplay of videos, enabling tooltips with definitions, and more.
